definition: empty cave, nothing there (idiom); devoid of substance/nothing new to show
(of a writing etc) to have no substance (idiom)/to carry no weight
the sky hangs low over the Yangtze, empty as far as the eye can see (idiom); nothing to see to the broad horizon
pinyin: tian1 di1 Wu2 Chu3 , yan3 kong1 wu2 wu4

sentences.english: Like every paradigm throughout history, at some point or another, things change.
sentences.chinese: 正如历史上所有的范例一样，世事常变，无物永驻。

sentences.english: Literary works without a skeleton are merely empty talks unworthy of reading"."
sentences.chinese: 没有骨骼的作品，是言之无物，是不值得一读的。

sentences.english: Women never have anything to say but they say it charmingly.
sentences.chinese: 女人从来都言之无物，但她们说话的方式总是很迷人。

sentences.english: The President's speech was full of generalities .
sentences.chinese: 总统的讲话通篇空洞无物。

sentences.english: "Nothing exists beyond the mind" is an important idea in Wang Yangming's mental outlook system.
sentences.chinese: “心外无物”是王阳明心学体系的重要命题。

sentences.english: Merry is that has nought to lose.
Who would enjoy sitting there listening to your whipping your gums?
sentences.chinese: 谁喜欢坐在那里听你的言之无物？

sentences.english: Methods are so short that they often seem without substance.
sentences.chinese: 方法是如此的短小，在他们看来简直言之无物。

sentences.english: The report looks impressive but it's really nothing but waffle.
sentences.chinese: 这篇报告貌似冠冕堂皇，实际上空洞无物。

sentences.english: Merry is he that have nought to lose.
When deeds speak, words are nothing.
sentences.chinese: 当事实说话的时候，言辞将空洞无物。

sentences.english: Words without ideas are like sails without wind.
Words without ideas are likes sails without wind.
sentences.chinese: 止之无物如同有帆无风。

sentences.english: Gently and almost weightlessly, radiating a warm and graceful light.
sentences.chinese: 温和且轻如无物，散发着优美温暖的光芒。

definition: no stronghold one cannot overcome (idiom); to conquer every obstacle/nothing one can't do/to carry everything before one
to rely on/to base oneself on
you (used to a superior or between persons of the same generation)/below the foot
lit. mole cricket and ants/fig. tiny individuals with no power
